segments.text: Honestly, this entire situation is just unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm starting to feel a surge of frustration building up inside me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so completely out of touch with her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring onto the floor, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting to think about the damage that water is causing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, taking cookies right under her nose!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could fall and break his neck on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, polishing a plate as if she's in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry to see such negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This isn't just a small oversight; it's a monumental lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen, fueled by her indifference.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a disregard for safety and order.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before things get completely out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just boils my blood to watch this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a complete train wreck in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR
